text:
Example: Bayes' formula (1)
Electcomp Corporation manufactures electronic components for computers and other
devices. There is speculation that Electcomp is about to announce a major expansion
into overseas markets. The expansion will occur, however, only if Electcomp's
managers estimate overseas demand to be sufficient to support the necessary sales.
Furthermore, if demand is sufficient and overseas expansion occurs, Electcomp is
likely to raise its prices.
